018package org.tquadrat.shootingtimer;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil.loadResourceBundle;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil.retrieveText;
023import static org.tquadrat.shootingtimer.Main.BASE_BUNDLE_NAME;
024import static org.tquadrat.shootingtimer.Main.MSG_CannotLoadTextResources;
025
026import java.util.Arrays;
027import java.util.MissingResourceException;
028import java.util.ResourceBundle;
029
030import org.apiguardian.api.API;
031import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Text;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Translation;
034
035/**
036 *  <p>{@summary The disciplines that the Shooting Timer application can be used
037 *  for.}</p>
038 *  <p>The name is based on the discipline number as used by the DSB.</p>
039 *
040 *  @version $Id: Discipline.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $
041 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
042 *  @UMLGraph.link
043 *  @since 0.1.0
044 */
045@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Discipline.java 106 2022-01-19 15:53:24Z tquadrat $" )
046@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
047public enum Discipline
048{

262    /**

265    @SuppressWarnings( "GrazieInspection" )
266    @Text
267    (
268        description = "Tie-break",
269        translations =
270        {
271            @Translation( language="de", text = "·                    Stechschuß" ),

275    TIEBREAK( "Tiebreak", new Heat []

279        new Heat( "TIEBREAK_75s", 75_000, 500, 1 )
280    } );
281
282        /*------------*\
283    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
284        \*------------*/
285    /**
286     *  The code number for this discipline as used by the DSB.
287     */
288    private final String m_DSBCode;
289
290    /**
291     *  The program for this discipline.
292     */
293    private final Heat [] m_Program;
294
295        /*------------------------*\
296    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
297        \*------------------------*/
298    /**
299     *  The resource bundle with the names.
300     */
301    private final static ResourceBundle m_ResourceBundle;
302
303    static
304    {
305        try
306        {
307            //---* Load the resource bundle with the texts *-------------------
308            m_ResourceBundle = loadResourceBundle( BASE_BUNDLE_NAME )
309                .orElseThrow( () -> new MissingResourceException( MSG_CannotLoadTextResources, BASE_BUNDLE_NAME, null ) );
310        }
311        catch( final MissingResourceException e )
312        {
313            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
314        }
315    }
316
317        /*--------------*\
318    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
319        \*--------------*/
320    /**
321     *  Creates a new {@code Discipline} instance.
322     *
323     *  @param  dsbCode The code number for this discipline as used by the
324     *      DSB (Deutscher Schützenbund).
325     *  @param  program The program for this discipline.
326     */
327    private Discipline( final String dsbCode, final Heat [] program )
328    {
329        m_DSBCode = dsbCode;
330        m_Program = program;
331    }   //  Discipline()
332
333        /*---------*\
334    ====** Methods **==========================================================
335        \*---------*/
336    /**
337     *  Retrieves the discipline that matches the given DSB code number.
338     *
339     *  @param  dsbCode The code as used by the DSB.
340     *  @return The discipline for the given code.
341     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    There is no discipline that matches
342     *      the given code.
343     */
344    @SuppressWarnings( "unused" )
345    public final static Discipline fromDSBCode( final String dsbCode ) throws IllegalArgumentException
346    {
347        final var retValue = Arrays.stream( values() )
348                .filter( d -> d.getDSBCode().equals( dsbCode ) )
349                .findAny()
350                .orElseThrow( () -> new IllegalArgumentException( dsbCode ) );
351
352        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
353        return retValue;
354    }   //  fromDSBCode()
355
356    /**
357     *  Returns the DSB code number.
358     *
359     *  @return The DSB code number.
360     */
361    public final String getDSBCode() { return m_DSBCode; }
362
363    /**
364     *  Returns the program.
365     *
366     *  @return The program.
367     */
368    public final Heat [] getProgram() { return m_Program; }
369
370    /**
371     *  {@inheritDoc}
372     *
373     *  @see Enum#toString()
374     */
375    @Override
376    public final String toString()
377    {
378        final var retValue = retrieveText( m_ResourceBundle, this );
379
380        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
381        return retValue;
382    }   //  toString()
383}
384//  class Discipline
385
386/*
387 *  End of File
388 */
